channel.title: Haven and Hearth
channel.description:
There is a multiplayer game called Haven and Hearth.
If you like minecraft, you'll probably also like Haven and Hearth. Only differences are the graphics, and that you can't just build whatever you want (but there still are a lot of options to build)
H&H is a multiplayer survival game. To see the trailer, go to
www.havenandhearth.com (I am NOT advertising. Only go to this website if you are interested in this game and would like to play it).
Note: The trailer on the website is 2 years old, graphics are a lot better now.
If u would like to play, leave a reply. You can join my settlement in-game and I can teach you everything.

Read full topic

@Loveandpower wrote:

Just saw a video of it, the concept is okay but I am not into the graphics.

Read full topic

item.title: Haven and Hearth
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

It looks boring, but it isn’t. And it’s exactly the opposite of limited. There are people who are playing this game for 1 year and still aren’t bored.

It’s really a fantastic game. And very realistic. Not something like minecraft, where you can find iron by digging 2 pieces of blocks. Metals are worth very much in this game, and mines are very hard to find.

You have attributes, there is permanent death (you can inherit yourself, but you won’t get everything back). Soft HP can be gained by resting. Hard HP by a leech bath or gauzes, Max HP by constitution. You can build a palisade, make a village, claim your items. There are many skills.

It’s really a fantastic game. You really have to try it out.

Read full topic
